result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr.

records.addlTxt:
11:25 AM Defendant Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court reviews bond motion filed by Atty Spansail.
Atty Spansail heard.
ADA heard on objects any modification to bond.
Court heard and denies the motion for any modification.
Bond and all conditions will remain in place as previously ordered.
11:28 AM

Defendant Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr. appeared by Zoom video, in custody at MCJ.  Attorney Jon G Spansail appeared by Zoom video for Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
3:07 p.m.
Copy of Information.
Waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Court schedules STC - Atty Spansail can request plea hrg date from JA.
3:10 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 03:10 pm.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing

9:33 AM Defendant Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr.  Attorney DeShea Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Spansail heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands.
Requests prelim within time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
9:35 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:59 AM Defendant Robert J Olsen-Beechner Jr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Spansail is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Spansail heard - deft understands charges and max penalties.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Spansail heard on bond.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $5,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact with Holy Smokes Shop or G.C. 
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
Court schedules with parties.
9:04 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
